⊣ ∅ ⊆ c0
⊣ (¬ c0 ∈ dom(cf)→(cf ` c0)= ∅)
⊣ dom(cf)= On

comment: Cofinality is bounded by its argument. Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 102. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)
